body: Look everyone, as many of you have been making topics about "Avicus shutting down" Or "Avicus is falling" Please, don't be worried. Avicus isn't going anywhere in the wrong direction. Sometime tonight I will be discussing with our staff team about ways to improve the player count and in game quality. One way that I'm willing to share with all of you is Advertisement. That's one of the main things we haven't really focused on, and no. That doesn't mean all of you run on to other servers spamming our server IP. There are other ways of advertising without spamming other servers. There are ways of advertising our server online, such as on popular Minecraft based websites such as Minecraft forums. We just need to find ways to advertise, and our player count should increase dramatically. So, please dont worry. We'll handle this.

replies.body: Just a note, I understand that in saying this you have good intentions, but I don't think having players going about advertising for the network is a good idea. (For example, going onto other servers or their forums and posting the IP makes a bad impression). Leave it to the administration/staff to set up official advertisements on things such as server listing, or perhaps contacting a YouTuber/streamer (or several) about making a video for the server.
